question: Who is the current chief minister of Haryana?

question: BASIC countries are___________________________.

option.a: Brazil, India, China, Australia and South Africa
option.b: Brazil, India, China, Argentina and South Africa
option.c: Brazil, India, China and South Africa
option.d: Brazil, India, China, Indonesia and South Africa

answer: Brazil, India, China and South Africa
description: The BASIC countries are the block of Brazil, India, China and South Africa formed based on an agreement in 2009. They committed to act jointly at the Copenhagen Climate Summit. The countries announced plans and targets accordingly. The grouping also agreed to provide technical aid to G77 countries.

question: Exercise Shakti-2019, a bilateral exercise between the Indian Army and ___________.

question: World Bank to fund USD 6 bn annual lending support to____________.
description: World Bank, the multi-lateral funding agency, has announced that it is to continue providing a $6 billion annual lending target for India to support infrastructure development and alleviate poverty.

question: Who has been appointed as the next Chief Justice of India (CJI)?

question: Who has been appointed as the new Director General of International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA)?

question: Leeladhar Jagoori received 2018 Vyas Samman, who is associated with___________.

question: Who is the first Lt Governor of the union territory of J&K?

question: Who has been appointed as the first Lt. Governor of Ladakh?
